metadata.synopsis: The hag assumes the form of Mayrina in the boss fight. The brothers are able to tell who is Mayrina and who is the hag.

0.speaker: Demir, Johl
0.context: NodeContext: You're in the middle of a fight. The hag has assumed the form of your sister but you can tell it's fake. Calling out a warning to the player - fear in your voice.

1.speaker: Demir, Johl
1.context: NodeContext: You're in the middle of a fight. The hag has assumed the form of your sister and you can tell which is the real one. You've spotted your sister. A warning to player not to attack your sister!

2.speaker: Johl
2.text: I smell you from here, hag. That ain't Rina!
2.context: NodeContext: You're in the middle of a fight. The hag has assumed the form of your sister but you can tell it's fake. Calling out a warning to the player - anger in your voice that the hag would try to trick you.

3.speaker: Johl
3.text: Hold on. I think it's Rina!
3.context: NodeContext: You're in the middle of a fight. The hag has assumed the form of your sister and you can tell which is the real one. You've spotted your sister. A warning to player and an assurance to your sister.
